title: The Dutch Oven from The Hawthorne Recipe
full_text:
The Dutch Oven from The Hawthorne Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cube
sugar cubes
3
dashes
Peychaud's Bitters
1
dash
Regans' Orange Bitters
1
capful
soda water
2
ounces
Barrel-Aged Bols Genever
1
two-inch piece
grapefruit twist
Directions
Place sugar cubes, bitters, and soda water in a mixing glass. Muddle into a smooth paste. Add Genever, ice, and stir.
Place ice ball or large ice cube in double old fashioned glass and strain cocktail over the ice. Squeeze grapefruit twist over the top and rub around the rim. Serve.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass,
muddler
,
bar spoon
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
